channel.title: sweet on Our Recipies
channel.description: Recent content in sweet on Our Recipies

item.title: Cider Syrum
item.description: Ingredients 1 gallon of apple cider Directions Place cider into large, flatbottomed pot Bring cider to a boil Reduce heat to a simmer. Let simmer until volume has reduced to 2 1/3 cup. Make sure to scrape the sides of the pot while reducing Syrup will become much more viscous as it reduces. Target viscosity will leave a notable trail in the pot when the bottom is wiped with a spatula.

item.title: Cider Jammy Dodgers
item.description: Ingredients 8 ounces (227 grams) butter unsalted, softened 2/3 cup (64 grams) granulated sugar 2 large eggs, room temperature 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 2 1/4 cups (330 grams) all-purpose flour 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup (64 grams) raspberry jam Directions Combine butter, sugar and eggs. Add the butter (227g) and sugar (64g) to a stand mixer or mixing bowl. Beat until light and fluffy. Add the eggs and continue to mix.
